author: Staff Reporter
text: Thirty four persons of Akila Indhiya Thevar Ina Makkal Kootamaippu courted arrest in Kovilpatti while staging a black flag protest against MDMK general secretary Vaiko. K. Annadurai, founder president of the Kootamaippu, who led the agitation in front of Thevar statue near Travellers’ Bungalow, said Mr. Vaiko was inciting caste conflict by referring to the murder of Shankar, a Dalit youth, in Udumalpet. The incident occurred following the inter-caste marriage of Shankar and Kausalya. But, Mr. Vaiko was talking ill of the Thevar community, citing it as ‘honour killing,’ he said.
title: 34 persons arrested
